item.title: Ruby Nuby Project
item.dc:creator: chuck@teachmetocode.com (Charles Max Wood)
item.description: GIVE US YOUR NUBIES! Are you a Ruby Nuby? Do you know someone who is? We want to hear from you! We, the Ruby Rogues, are planning an episode all about what it’s like to be a Ruby Nuby in 2012. We want to talk to some actual Nubies. And we need your help finding them. [...]
